Sludge::

Sludge stood up and shook his body tryig to do that Hoist fell of his 
(Sludge) body


--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Hoist stood on Sludge's back, trying to gain footing. His device on 
his
> back jutted up a bit, then scanned Sludge's head area. "Now come on
> Slag, is that anyway to treat your fellow Dinobot?" he asked 
jovialy,
> rather finding this situation humorous himself.
